description: This module can create and delete GCE private images from gzipped compressed tarball containing raw disk data or from existing detached disks in any zone. U(https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/images)

name.description: the name of the image to create or delete

pem_file.description: path to the pem file associated with the service account email

source.description: the source disk or the Google Cloud Storage URI to create the image from

zone.description: the zone of the disk specified by source
